00020 #include <complex>

00025 #include "gen_filename.hpp"

00035 #include <iostream>
00036 #include <vector>

00038 
00048 
00049 class save_datastream : public processor::base, public gen_filename {
00050 public:
00051   save_datastream(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00052     : base(config) 
00053     , base_path_(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.filePath"))
00054     , file_period_(gen_filename::str2period(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.filePeriod")))
00055     , pos_(0)
00056     , stream_number_(0) {
00057   }
00058   virtual ~save_datastream() {}
00059 
00060   virtual std::string fileExtension() const { return "bin"; }
00061   virtual file_period filePeriod() const { return file_period_; }
00062 
00063   virtual void process(service::sptr sp,
00064                        const_iterator begin,
00065                        const_iterator end) {
00066 #if 1
00067     const size_t length(std::distance(begin, end));
00068     std::cout << "process " << sp->id()
00069               << " " << sp->approx_ptime()
00070               << " " << sp->stream_name()
00071               << " length= " << length
00072               << std::endl;
00073 #endif
00074     const boost::filesystem::path
00075       filepath(gen_file_path(base_path_, sp->stream_name(), sp->approx_ptime()));
00076     if (boost::filesystem::exists(filepath) and (pos_ == std::streampos(0))) {
00077       std::cerr << "file '" << filepath << "' exists and will be overwritten" << std::endl;
00078       boost::filesystem::remove(filepath);
00079     }
00080     if (not boost::filesystem::exists(filepath)) {
00081       std::ofstream ofs(filepath.c_str(), std::ios::binary);        
00082       if (not directory_.contains(sp->stream_name())) {
00083         const std::pair<boost::uint32_t, bool> r(directory_.insert(sp->stream_name()));
00084         ASSERT_THROW(r.second == true);
00085         stream_number_ = r.first;
00086       }
00087 
00088       const std::string sd(directory_.serialize(sp->approx_ptime()));
00089       const network::protocol::header h(directory_.id(), sp->approx_ptime(), 0, sd.size());
00090       std::copy(h.begin(),  h.end(),  std::ostream_iterator<char>(ofs, ""));
00091       std::copy(sd.begin(), sd.end(), std::ostream_iterator<char>(ofs, ""));
00092       pos_ = ofs.tellp();
00093     }
00094     std::ofstream ofs(filepath.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00095     ofs.seekp(pos_);
00096     const network::protocol::header h
00097       (sp->id(), sp->approx_ptime(), stream_number_, std::distance(begin, end));
00098     std::copy(h.begin(), h.end(), std::ostream_iterator<char>(ofs, ""));
00099     std::copy(begin,     end,     std::ostream_iterator<char>(ofs, ""));
00100     pos_ = ofs.tellp();      
00101   }
00102 private:
00103   std::string                     base_path_;
00104   gen_filename::file_period       file_period_;
00105   std::streampos                  pos_;    
00106   network::broadcaster::directory directory_;
00107   boost::uint32_t                 stream_number_;
00108 } ;
00109 
00110 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00111 {
00112   namespace po = boost::program_options;
00113   po::options_description desc("Allowed options");
00114   desc.add_options()
00115     ("help,?",                                                         "produce help message")
00116     ("version,v",                                                      "display version")
00117     ("host,h",   po::value<std::string>()->default_value("127.0.0.1"), "server hostname")
00118     ("port,p",   po::value<std::string>()->default_value("18001"),     "server port")
00119     ("stream,s", po::value<std::string>()->default_value("DataIQ"),    "stream name")
00120     ("path",     po::value<std::string>()->default_value("Data"),      "file path for saved data")
00121     ("period",   po::value<std::string>()->default_value("5m"),        "file period (1m,5m,1h,1d)");
00122 
00123   po::variables_map vm;
00124   try {
00125     po::store(po::parse_command_line(argc, argv, desc), vm);
00126     po::notify(vm);
00127     
00128     if (vm.count("help")) {
00129       std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00130       return 1;
00131     }
00132     if (vm.count("version")) {
00133       std::cout << SVN_VERSION_STRING << std::endl;
00134       return 1;
00135     }
00136   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00137     std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00138     std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00139     return 1;
00140   }
00141   
00142   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", "save_datastream");
00143 
00144   try {
00145     // make up ptree config
00146     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00147     config.put("server.<xmlattr>.host", vm["host"].as<std::string>());
00148     config.put("server.<xmlattr>.port", vm["port"].as<std::string>());
00149     config.put("<xmlattr>.filePath",    vm["path"].as<std::string>());
00150     config.put("<xmlattr>.filePeriod",  vm["period"].as<std::string>());
00151 
00152     const std::string stream_name(vm["stream"].as<std::string>());
00153     network::client::client<save_datastream> c(config);
00154 
00155     const std::set<std::string> streams(c.ls());
00156     if (streams.find(stream_name) != streams.end())
00157       ASSERT_THROW(c.connect_to(stream_name) == true);
00158     else
00159       throw std::runtime_error(str(boost::format("stream '%s' is not available")
00160                                    % stream_name));
00161     c.start();
00162     run_in_thread(network::get_io_service());
00163   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00164     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00165     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00166     return 1;
00167   }
00168   return 0;
00169 }
